snippet: Chuck Hagel, the defense secretary-designate, has been characterized as soft on Iran, but he has been sounding more hawkish since meetings at the Pentagon, officials say.

byline.original: By DAVID E. SANGER and THOM SHANKER

lead_paragraph: Chuck Hagel, the defense secretary-designate, has been characterized as soft on Iran, but he has been sounding more hawkish since meetings at the Pentagon, officials say.

headline.seo: In Transition to Defense Post, Hagel Focuses on Iran
headline.main: In Transition, Hagel Gets Up to Speed on Iran

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
